elements.name: question5
elements.title: An apprenticeship contract is concluded between the learner and the VET provider.
elements.defaultValue: Lernende und Lehrbetrieb schliessen miteinander einen Vertrag ab.

elements.name: question4
elements.title: The apprenticeship contract is concluded at the beginning for the entire duration of the basic vocational training.
elements.correctAnswer: The apprenticeship contract is valid for the entire duration of the apprenticeship.

elements.name: question1
elements.title: The apprenticeship contract must be approved by the competent cantonal authority. No fees may be charged for approval.
elements.correctAnswer: The cantonal authority (office) must approve the apprenticeship contract and may not charge anything for it.

elements.name: question8
elements.title: If the apprenticeship contract is terminated, the education provider must immediately notify the cantonal authority and, if applicable, the vocational school.
elements.correctAnswer: If an apprenticeship contract is terminated, the training company must inform the cantonal authorities immediately. If necessary, the company must also inform the vocational school.

elements.name: question7
elements.title: If a company is closed or no longer provides VET in accordance with the statutory provisions, the cantonal authorities shall ensure, as far as possible, that any initial VET can be duly completed.
elements.correctAnswer: In the following cases, the cantonal authority supports apprentices in completing their apprenticeship in another company: a) If a training company has to close. b) If the training company does not comply with the regulations.
